# RecognizeTextRequest.RecognitionLevel.accurate

**Case**

Accurate text recognition takes more time to produce a more comprehensive result.

## Declaration

```swift
case accurate
```

## Getting the recognition levels

- **RecognizeTextRequest.RecognitionLevel.fast**: Fast text recognition returns results more quickly at the expense of accuracy.
